g:HTML.p: The Web NPC builder is a javascript application for constructing NPCs for use in Spycraft 2.0 or Fantasy Craft RPGs from Crafty Games.
To keep your NPC just copy and paste the stat block into the text editor of your choice. The builder can import from its own stat blocks for future editing of the NPC.
For comments/feedback please contact me via the Crafty Games Forum where I go by the name meadicus.
